title: Biggest Takeaways From the First Week of the NBA Season | Real Ones
description:
After the first week of the 2020-21 NBA campaign, Logan and Raja get into Raja’s experiences playing in Christmas games (2:45), their biggest takeaways from the new season (20:00), the Clippers' meltdown (44:00), and what, if anything, can be done about Golden State (51:30).
Hosts: Logan Murdock and Raja Bell
